Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Western
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen, and Chicago, due to a street blockage near Chicago/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen, and Chicago, then resume their normal route: due to a street blockage near Chicago/Western. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Kedzie, Marquette, California and 63rd, due to fire department activity near 63rd/Sacramento

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Kedzie, Marquette, California and 63rd then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 63rd/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
